gift_source:

What does FAST stand for?
{
= Features from Accelerated Segment Test
~ Fourier-based Adaptive Segmentation Tool
~ Fast Approximation of Shape Tracking
~ Feature Analysis by Spatial Threshold
}
title: MC3
question: What does FAST stand for?

gift_source:
::MC4::
Which is an advantage of FAST?
{
= High speed, suitable for real-time
~ Invariant to all transformations
~ Provides descriptors directly
~ Works only on binary images
}

question: Which is an advantage of FAST?
